cast.overview: Two carefree pals from Brooklyn traveling through rural Alabama on their way back to college are mistakenly arrested, and charged with murder. Fortunately, one of them has a cousin who's a lawyer - Vincent Gambini, a former auto mechanic from Brooklyn who just passed his bar exam after his sixth try. When he arrives with his leather-clad girlfriend, to try his first case, it's a real shock - for him and the Deep South!
cast.title: My Cousin Vinny

details.biography:
Mitchell Whitfield (born on September 8, 1964) is an American actor. He may be best known for his role as Stan Rothenstein, opposite Ralph Macchio, in My Cousin Vinny.

He guest-starred in several episodes of Friends as Dr. Barry Farber, Rachel's orthodontist ex-fiancé whom Rachel left at the altar on their wedding day. He also appeared in Dharma & Greg; Murder, She Wrote; Diagnosis Murder and CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. He voiced Phobos on W.I.T.C.H. and Donatello in the 2007 TMNT film.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.
details.name: Mitchell Whitfield
details.place_of_birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
